If it\'s not displayed there you could try to expand menu by tapping on icon like one above and then try to find \"Share\" option.
Share icon could also be displayed at the bottom.

There are two ways your phone can act when you rotate it: 
1. Nothing happens
2. Content of screen is rotated 

To choose the way your phone react on rotation you have to change orientation setting.

This app is created for my mom, that kept asking me for help with sending image via her favourite app.
To be honest no one has to know right away what icon \"Share\" looks like.
Aim of this application is to teach user how to do certain actions and help them understand android.
If you have any suggestion about this app, let me know.
This app is an open source project. Go ahead an take a look at source code.
